mapper.select: SELECT q.id, q.qcode, q.q_desc, q.q_type, q.title, q.optiona, q.optionb, q.optionc, q.optiond, q.optione, q.optionf, q.optiong, q.answer, q.score, q.know_id, q.analysis, q.subject_id, k.title AS k_title, k.kcode FROM t_question AS q JOIN t_know AS k ON q.know_id = k.id WHERE q.subject_id = #{subjectId} ORDER BY q.id

SELECT q.id,q.qcode,q.q_desc,q.q_type,q.title,q.optiona,q.optionb,q.optionc,q.optiond,q.optione,q.optionf,q.optiong,q.answer,q.score,q.know_id,q.analysis,q.subject_id,k.title AS k_title FROM t_question AS q JOIN t_know AS k ON q.know_id = k.id WHERE q.id = #{id}

SELECT q.id,q.qcode,q.q_desc,q.q_type,q.title,q.optiona,q.optionb,q.optionc,q.optiond,q.optione,q.optionf,q.optiong,q.answer,q.score,q.know_title as knowTitle,q.analysis,q.subject_id as subjectId FROM t_question AS q WHERE q.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_question SET qcode = #{qcode},q_desc=#{desc},q_type=#{type},title=#{title},optiona=#{optiona},optionb=#{optionb},optionc=#{optionc},optiond=#{optiond},optione=#{optione},optionf=#{optionf},optiong=#{optiong},answer=#{answer},score=#{score},know_id=#{knowId},analysis=#{analysis},know_title = #{knowTitle} WHERE id = #{id}
